# Claudiu Ivan - Principal System Architect

> Personal website of Claudiu Ivan, a Principal System Architect specializing
> in type-driven development, distributed systems, and deterministic architecture.

## About

Claudiu Ivan is the founder of Software Foundry (https://softwarefoundry.ch),
an architectural consulting practice for organizations building data-intensive
platforms and mission-critical systems.

## Expertise

- System Architecture
- Distributed Systems
- Type Theory
- Functional Programming
- Platform Engineering
- Data-Intensive Applications

## Content

- /writing/ - Technical articles on software architecture and engineering
- /rss.xml - RSS feed for updates
